author: Brewskie

files.name: Lamplight_2alpha
files.changelogHtml:
Hooked the mod up to Tamriel.
Various tweaks of the AI to some characters.
Started creating the interior of the buildings.
Made a lot of things for the \"backbone\" of the mod, such as a new faction etc.
Expanded the size of the mountain where the entrance is. This way it makes a little more sense due to the size of the town inside the mountain.

files.name: Lamplight_3alpha
files.changelogHtml:
Initial scenes to get the player started complete.
Hundreds of touch ups on the exteriors.

files.name: Lamplight_4alpha1
files.changelogHtml: Changed Installation Method To Make It Easier

files.name: Lamplight Beta 01
files.changelogHtml:
Many touch ups in lighting, effects, scripts and so on.
Created a Northern entrance to Lamplight.
Removed the log building on the right of the South entrance.
Placed tents where the log building was and put the campfire there too.
Created some secret rooms that I will not reveal until the appropriate quests are in place.

files.name: Lamplight Beta 02
files.changelogHtml:
Many touch ups in lighting, effects, scripts and so on.
Major changes to the Southern entrance to Lampligt
Added some bandits guarding the Southern entrance.
Created an opening scene where the bandits don't let the player in....yet.
Created the first encounter with the major character "Scurrvy"

files.name: Lamplight Beta 03
files.changelogHtml:
Initial scenes to get the player started complete.
Hundreds of touch ups on the exteriors.
